name: py-workload-automation

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.

dependencies.name: py-devlib
dependencies.description: Library for interaction with and instrumentation of remote devices.

dependencies.name: py-future
dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2

dependencies.name: py-louie
dependencies.description:
Louie provides Python programmers with a straightforward way to dispatch
signals between objects in a wide variety of contexts. It is based on
PyDispatcher, which in turn was based on a highly-rated recipe in the
Python Cookbook.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pexpect
dependencies.description: Pexpect allows easy control of interactive console applications.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wrapt
dependencies.description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.
